Package de.stroeer.proxity.gateway

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Gateway.IGatewayListener
    This class is the information interface between app and sdk.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Gateway
    Is responsible for:
    - holding a list of IGatewayListeners list of last messages
    - manages the IGatewayListener adding Gateway.addListener(de.stroeer.proxity.gateway.Gateway.IGatewayListener) removing Gateway.removeListener(de.stroeer.proxity.gateway.Gateway.IGatewayListener)
    - Notifications for debug Gateway.notifyDebug(ResponseCode, String, Serializable) warnings Gateway.notifyWarning(ResponseCode, String), Gateway.notifyWarning(ResponseCode, String, Serializable) infos Gateway.notifyInfo(ResponseCode, String), Gateway.notifyInfo(ResponseCode, String, Serializable) failures Gateway.notifyFailure(ResponseCode, String), Gateway.notifyFailure(ResponseCode, String, Serializable) all messages Gateway.notifyMessage(Message, boolean)
    - Send all current messages again Gateway.resendCurrentMessages()

    - Clear all current messages Gateway.clearMessages()

    - Send all current states again Gateway.resendCurrentState()

    - Notifies on status listeners and broadcasts and writes logs if connection dependencies are: added Gateway.onConnectionDependenciesAdded(Integer, boolean) removed Gateway.onConnectionDependenciesRemoved(Integer, boolean)
    - Set the minimal log level Gateway.setMinLogLevel(MessageType)

    - inner classes: interface IGatewayListener enum MessageType
    Message
    This class represents all information which was sent from inside of the sdk.
    MessageIntent
    Represents a model for an intent which holds:
    the message with all information which was sent from inside of the sdk MessageIntent.getMessage() the information if the message was sent before MessageIntent.isNew()
    - converts an intent to an MessageIntent MessageIntent.fromIntent(Intent)
    StatusIntent
    Represents a model for an Intent which holds: the status of the sdk StatusIntent.getStatus() the information if the status is gained or revoked StatusIntent.isGained() the information if the status was send before StatusIntent.wasDeliveredBefore()
    - converts an given intent to a StatusIntent StatusIntent.fromIntent(Intent)
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Dependencies
    Representing the state of the SDK.
    This also controls the offline functionality of the SDK.
    Gateway.MessageType  
    ResponseCode
    Enumeration for possible response codes
